title: Garouden
sinopse: The story of a muscular man with a mysterious past and his involvement against yakuza and other shady fellow...
links: ng the best each had to offer, Tanba came to the FAW (a gym that trains pro-wrestlers) and is pitted against T. Kajiwara. Tanba is defeated and humiliated after realizing that he is not strong enough and disappears for 3 years. Upon his return, he has become nearly unbeatable.
